misc: Doubles as a professional model as his side hustle
Few players dare to give him lip due to his intimidating presence and wrestling skills
biography: Olli, a formidable presence on the golf course, brings a unique blend of athleticism and intimidation to the Hector Trophée. Representing Helsingin Golfklubi, Olli's imposing stature and rumored wrestling prowess often leave his opponents hesitant to challenge him directly.

Beyond golf, Olli balances his time as a professional model, showcasing a different facet of his multifaceted personality. This venture into the world of fashion complements his disciplined approach to golf, highlighting his ability to excel in diverse fields.

With seven past appearances in the Hector Trophée, Olli is determined to leave a lasting mark on the tournament. Though the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Olli's competitive spirit remains undeterred as he sets his sights on Hector Trophée 2025, marking his eighth appearance in the tournament.
